title: INtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: As EU waters down 2035 EV goals, electric startups express concern
items.description: The future may be electric, but that future is being postponed. The European Commission, citing the need for flexibility, has softened its ambitious p...

items.title: Research Reveals the Optimal Way to Optimize
items.description: The leading approach to the simplex method, a widely used technique for balancing complex logistical constraints, can’t get any better.

items.title: 8 Best Space Heaters (2025): Tested, Measured, and Mistreated
items.description: These portable heaters will heat a room quickly, quietly, and safely.

items.title: Waymo suspends service in San Francisco as robotaxis stall during blackout
items.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

items.title: 8 Best Planners of 2026: Roterunner, Hobonichi, Kokuyo
items.description: Digital tools are not always superior. Here are some WIRED-tested paper agendas and notebooks to keep you on track.

items.title: Israel’s famed VC Jon Medved, diagnosed with ALS, backed the tech that will improve his life
items.description: In perhaps the last public interview of one Israel's most famous VCs, Jon Medved tells TechCrunch how tech will enhance his life.

items.title: What Is Lossless Audio, and Do You Really Need It?
items.description: Lossless audio is the first step toward audio nirvana. But what is it, does it really make a difference, and how can you get it? Here’s what to know.

items.title: 5 Best Monitors for the Mac Mini (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: The Mac Mini is a fantastic little computer, but you'll need one of these great monitors to complete the setup.
